pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model-Based Detection of Disease Clusters // Model-based methods for the detection of disease clusters using GLMs, GLMMs and zero-inflated models. These methods are described in 'V. Gmez- Rubio et al.' (2019) doi:10.18637/jss.v090.i14 and 'V. Gmez- Rubio et al.' (2018) doi:10.1007/978-3-030-01584-8_1.
